room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Apothecary" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Brendon was fabulous. We did the wizard's apothecary with six 11-year-olds. Fun and challenging. They had a blast. Thanks Brendon!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Apothecary" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: We had a great time at Escape Room! We chose the Wizard room and had a blast! Beautiful sets and props make the game so much fun! The game was harder than we expected, but we go out with 20 seconds to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Apothecary" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: This was awesome!! Had a great time and fun people

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Apothecary" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: If you are looking for a great team building experience this is it!

room_title: Escape room "The Wizard's Apothecary" by Escape Room Live in Washington, D.C.
review: Great interactive puzzles that have unique answers. Lots of fun for both big and small groups
